title: Cannot connect to games :( (client crashes, windows error)
body: Ever since the patch, my client just won't connect to games... anyone know a solution? Repairing the client didn't fix the problem either.

replies.body: yes i  had the same problem the only way i ended up fixing it was by reinstalling the whole game really shitty but i hope it helps
Thanks mate, I've reinstalled but for whatever reason the game keeps crashing maybe ill delete some older files or something.
